sentences.sContent: Much of this, she says, is due to increased urbanization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Much of this, she says, is due to increased urbanization.
sentences.sCn: 而这些，主要是由于不断增加的都市化造成的。

sentences.sContent: These diseases are now everywhere, driven as they are by universal forces, like urbanization and the globalization of unhealthy lifestyles.
sentences.sContent_eng: These diseases are now everywhere, driven as they are by universal forces, like urbanization and the globalization of unhealthy lifestyles.
sentences.sCn: 现在，在城市化和不健康生活方式的全球化等普遍因素的影响下，这些疾病无处不在。

sentences.sContent: Countries and regions all over the world face the challenge of urbanization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Countries and regions all over the world face the challenge of urbanization.
sentences.sCn: 全球各地的国家和地区都面临城市化的挑战。

sentences.sContent: ...With the development of urbanization and the accumulation of wealth...
...that the wave of urbanization isn't just about the migration of people into urban environments...
...the process of urbanization will only accelerate in the decades to come — with an enormous impact on biodiversity and potentially on climate change...
...The urbanization wave can't be stopped — and it shouldn't be...
...In what way is urbanization in poor countries good for the environment...
...What can be done to minimize the negative impact of urbanization according to Seto...

words.tran: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的

trans.tranOther: Urbanization is the process of creating cities or towns in country areas
